title: Project-Based Learning Course for Advanced Data Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic statistics and data analysis
context.additional_context: Work-Integrated Education for Science-Related Job Applications

learning_goals: Practical competencies are assessed at each stage of the data project lifecycle (planning-collection-analysis-visualization-interpretation).
Learners achieve proficiency in data processing and visualization using industry-standard tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau).
Learners develop the ability to clearly communicate complex scientific information through data-driven storytelling.
Learners cultivate the ability to explore new data analysis techniques using self-directed learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
